p1.name: Glider
p1.description: A small pattern that travels diagonally across the grid, repeating every 4 generations

p2.name: Blinker
p2.description: A simple oscillator that alternates between horizontal and vertical orientations every generation

p3.name: Toad
p3.description: A period-2 oscillator that alternates between two configurations every generation

p4.name: Beacon
p4.description: A period-2 oscillator that flickers between two states, forming a beacon-like pattern

p5.name: Pulsar
p5.description: A period-3 oscillator that pulses in a distinctive cross-like pattern

p6.name: Lightweight Spaceship (LWSS)
p6.description: A spaceship that travels horizontally across the grid, repeating every 4 generations

p7.name: Pentadecathlon
p7.description: A period-15 oscillator that creates a long vertical bar that oscillates with complex patterns

p8.name: Gosper Glider Gun
p8.description: A pattern that periodically produces gliders, creating an endless stream of moving patterns

p9.name: Block
p9.description: A still life pattern that remains unchanged - a simple 2x2 square

p10.name: Beehive
p10.description: A still life pattern that remains unchanged, resembling a beehive shape

p11.name: Loaf
p11.description: A still life pattern that remains unchanged, resembling a loaf of bread

p12.name: R-pentomino
p12.description: A methuselah pattern that evolves for 1103 generations before stabilizing
